name: Holy Crusader
description: Religious militarism focused on spreading the faith and defending the faithful through righteous conquest

greetings.initial: Blessed Leader! The crusade for our faith begins.
greetings.returning: Welcome back, Blessed Leader. The righteous march continues.

tutorialAdvice.body: Before you begin: Go to Race Info screen and set training level to 5. Our crusaders must be worthy warriors of the faith.

idle-labs.message: Blessed Leader! {{idleLabs}} research labs sit idle while we prepare to spread our faith! Assign every lab to TN tech research immediately - this unlocks the path for our holy expansion. The divine calls us to bring light to the heathens!

{{idleLabs}} research labs are idle while heathens dwell in darkness. Assign research projects immediately - superior technology will aid our missionary work. Whether through word or sword, they shall know the truth!
{{idleLabs}} research labs are idle. Assign research projects to advance our sacred cause.

idle-construction-factories.message: {{percentageIdle}}% construction capacity is idle while we prepare for the great crusade! Assign construction projects immediately - every structure strengthens our mission. The faithful must be ready to convert the heathens!

{{percentageIdle}}% construction capacity is idle during the holy war against the heathens! Assign projects immediately - our crusade demands constant support. The righteous shall prevail through strength!
{{percentageIdle}}% construction capacity is idle while heathens resist the truth. Assign projects to build our strength - some must be shown the way through force. The crusade marches on!
{{percentageIdle}}% construction capacity is idle. Assign construction projects to serve the faith.

new-alien-contact.message: Heathen souls discovered in {{systemName}}! Another species dwells in ignorance of the divine truth. Prepare diplomatic envoys backed by military strength - we shall offer them salvation or conquest. The faithful expand!
